mapper.select: SELECT distinct id FROM boot_sys_role order by update_date desc

SELECT distinct boot_sys_role.id FROM boot_sys_role ,boot_sys_user ,boot_sys_user_role
and boot_sys_user.id = boot_sys_user_role.user_id AND boot_sys_role.id = boot_sys_user_role.role_id
AND boot_sys_user.id = #{userId}
order by boot_sys_role.update_date desc

SELECT name,id,sort FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN super_admin = 1 THEN '超级管理员' ELSE '' END name, '1' as id, 9999 as sort FROM boot_sys_user WHERE id = #{userId} UNION SELECT boot_sys_role.`name`, boot_sys_role.id, boot_sys_role.sort FROM boot_sys_role, boot_sys_user_role WHERE boot_sys_role.id = boot_sys_user_role.role_id AND boot_sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId} ) tmp WHERE name <> '' order by sort desc

select id,`name`,sort from boot_sys_role where del_flag = '0'
and `name` like concat('%',#{qo.name},'%')
and ( ${qo.sqlFilter} )
order by sort desc
select id,`name`,sort from boot_sys_role where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update boot_sys_role set del_flag = '1' where id = #{id}
